contents.text: Our global cover looks at why the world’s battle with inflation is far from over. Today’s investors are betting that inflation, the world economy’s biggest problem, can be brought down without much fuss. But there may be turbulence ahead.
Leaders: Inflation will be harder to bring down than markets thinkBriefing: Lots of investors think inflation is under control. Not so fast
